text: Wayne R. Bock Jr. (May 28, 1934 – September 11, 2016) is a former American football player who played for Chicago Cardinals of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at the University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Illinois Fighting Illini football players Category:Chicago Cardinals players
title: Wayne Bock
